body.description: The original, dermatologist-recommended basis soap with soothing chamomile for the purest, mildest clean ever. This very caring, ultra pure formula does more than clean sensitive skin. Natural calming agents chamomile and aloe vera soothe and comfort skin. Use as a hand soap or body wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Soothing Marvel: Basis Sensitive Skin Bar Soap
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Basis Sensitive Skin Bar Soap for a few weeks now, and I can confidently say that it has completely transformed my skincare routine. A well-formulated product that is gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin, it delicately cleanses without stripping away essential moisture.What sets this soap apart is its balanced formulation. Enriched with calming chamomile and hydrating aloe vera, this soap not only cleanses but also soothes the skin. The natural ingredients lend it a therapeutic feel, making each bath akin to a mini spa session right in the comfort of my home. As someone with skin that tends to react to harsher formulations, this bar soap was a breath of fresh air.Moreover, Basis Sensitive Skin Bar Soap isn't just limited to body wash - it doubles as an excellent facial cleanser too. The bar is gentle enough to use on the face, removing dirt and oil without causing any irritation or dryness. After each use, my skin feels clean, refreshed, and not tight or overly dry, as is the case with many other bar soaps.The fragrance-free formulation is another major plus, especially for those of us with sensitive skin prone to irritation from added perfumes or fragrances. Even without an artificial scent, this soap maintains a clean and refreshing feel, thanks to its natural ingredients.In terms of practicality, the bar lasts for a considerable amount of time, making it a cost-effective option for daily skincare. The size and shape of the soap are also comfortable to hold, with the bar lathering up well to deliver a luxurious washing experience.In summary, Basis Sensitive Skin Bar Soap is a fantastic choice for anyone seeking a gentle yet effective skincare solution. It is a product that truly lives up to its promise, providing a cleanse that not only leaves skin clean but also soothed and nourished. Whether you're using it as a body wash or a facial cleanser, you can't go wrong with this soap. I wholeheartedly recommend this product to all, especially those with sensitive skin like me.As I continue to use this soap, I look forward to experiencing more of the positive effects it has on my skin. Kudos to Basis for developing such a high-quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How do you rate soap?
reviews.reviewText: Let's face it, rating a bar of soap is probably the most subjective review anyone can write because people's tastes vary so much. So I'll keep this short. It has a slight scent. Feels dense. Lathers very well. Advertised as good for sensitive skin (I've had no issues with it). I bought this brand for its quality value per dollar. I believe it is a high quality, dense bar that is reasonably priced which means its a good value. I have reordered the six pack so many times over the years, I've lost count. You just have to try it and see if you like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: In my half century of life, these are the BEST bath soap I've ever used!Over the last 6 years I've used "sustainable" bath soaps from one company but I lacked trust in their products and practices.These bath soaps last longer than other bars I have ever used, I feel squeaky clean and smooth - no built up soap scum on me; the shower soap scum is not excessive like most other bath soaps either. I wanted NO FRAGRANCE and that's what I got!The soap is easy to handle in the shower because of its unique shape and 4 oz size. Packaging is much more than I expected; I truly LOVE these! I can see me using these for the next century of my life - I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best soap around for faces and sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I once thought this soap was only for faces. Then, I got lazy and started using it as my regular bar soap. Turns out, being lazy paid dividends 10x over ... because this soap is excellent as a one-bar for all solution.The thing is; Most of us have sensitive skin, whether we know it or not. I get minor irritations from fragrances in soaps, harsh detergents, and a variety of allergy-induced issues. This soap removes most of those issues from the scene since it's gentle, fragrance-free, and doesn't over-degrease your skin.And yeah, I'm a dude ... but I'm a dude who cares about the largest and most important organ in my body (i.e., skin). Over-cleaning skin causes problems. Under-cleaning skin causes problems. Over-fragranced soaps cause problems. But this one doesn't. It's also rightly priced, which is weird in today's marketplace.Soaps are surprisingly personal, but I've found that this one leaves my skin cleanest, healthiest, and doesn't over-dry my skin, as some heavier detergent-laced soaps can. I live by these bars, and since they're not reliably available in my area, I'm glad that I can get a large pack like this from Amazon. Definitely recommend this to anyone who finds other soaps to be over-drying, or who is prone to allergies or rashes. Perfect for face and body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy lather, doesn’t take much, lasts a while, smells alright and rinses off easy without drying your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best soap yet
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad I found this soap. Bars last long and leave my oily skin feeling smooth and clean. Best of all, my nose does not get plugged up from the scent because there really isn't a scent. I go to bed able to breathe better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best face soap ever
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff. I started using it because an ex boyfriend of mines mother has the best skin at 60-something. I asked what she used and she said she used this bar and some sort of regular lotion only. I bought the bar and it made a HUGE difference in the quality of my skin. I go a few days using something else and my skin is tired and blackheads galore but immediately after going back to this bar, it freshens up and super clean. Highly recommend for sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No fragrance, non drying
reviews.reviewText: This soap is gentle on sensitive skin, no fragrance or colours. Long lasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is my second order of this 6 pack soap. They are extremely good if you’ve dry hands and having to constantly moisturise your hands. It reduces the itching although I found when in the depths of the winter months you will still from time to time ( it every day) moisturise your hands but the soap helps.
Muy buenos, soy de piel súper sensible y me caen bien estas barras. Se siente un poco rara la piel al enjuagar pero en cuanto aplico crema mi piel queda bien.
It's my bath soap. No residue on skin after shower. Skin don't feel dry after shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Very good doesn’t leave your skin tight good for me as I have Roseai
El mejor jabón que he usado, la piel se siente limpia sin sentirse seca o tirante, definitivamente lo volveré a comprar!
